detail_desc: Leggings in lightweight cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides, a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles, and rubber soles. Heel 4 cm.
Short skirt in a soft weave with a high waist and sewn-in belt with metal D-rings. Side pockets, pleats front and back and a concealed zip and button at the back.
Lace bikini briefs with a low waist, lined gusset, satin ribbons that tie at the sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
T-shirt in sturdy cotton jersey with contrasting colour panels over the shoulders.
Large earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads. Length 6 cm.
Ankle-length, pull-on trousers in an airy weave with a regular, elasticated waist, welt side pockets and fake back pockets. Loose fit with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases.
Cardigan in a soft jacquard knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.

Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest which, combined with a gently tapered waist, creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Cotton jersey shorts with side pockets and an elasticated waist with a frill trim and bow.

Sandals in imitation leather with metal studs, an ankle strap with a metal buckle and wedge heels covered in braided jute. Imitation leather insoles and fluted soles. Platform front 3.5 cm. Heel 7.5 cm.
Short, fitted lace dress with long, transparent sleeves and a concealed zip at the back. Contrasting colour lining front and back.
Tops in soft organic cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and long puff sleeves. Decorative scalloped trim around the neckline and cuffs.

Blouse in a crisp cotton weave with double-layered, voluminous puff sleeves that have pleats on the shoulders and elastication around the hems. Stand-up collar and a visible zip with a long tab at the back of the neck.

Bomber jacket woven in a nylon blend with a stand-up collar with a decorative zip and tab with press-studs. Zip down the front, a chest pocket, zipped side pockets and one inner pocket with a concealed press-stud. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the boxer shorts is organic.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a slightly wider neckline, a seam centre back and raw, roll edges around the neckline and sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
Leggings in sturdy jersey. High waist with concealed elastication.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Large earrings in metal and plastic with pendants in various sizes and designs. Length approx. 11 cm.

Set of a long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey, a pair of shorts and a pair of fine-knit tights. Top with a small opening and button at the back of the neck, and a flounce extending over the shoulders. Shorts with covered elastication at the back of the waist, a fake fly and press-stud and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Tights with an elasticated waist.
Dungaree shorts in soft, washed, patterned cotton denim with narrow, adjustable straps, a drawstring at the waist and front pockets.
Short skirt in soft, supple suede with contrasting colour seams, a zip down the front with a concealed button at the top, and discreet side pockets. Lined.

Knee-length dress in woven fabric with a pleated stand-up collar and a small opening at the back with covered buttons at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with pleated, buttoned cuffs, a concealed zip in one side and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and rounded hems.
Maxi dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and seam under the bust. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip at the back. Unlined.

Leotard in stretch jersey with glittery details and decorative tassels at the front and 3/4-length sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, asymmetric, tiered tulle skirt. Detachable cape in tulle with a shimmering pattern.
Soft, block-coloured shopper with two handles and a concealed magnetic fastener at the top. Unlined. Size 9x27x39 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Earrings in various sizes and designs. Three pairs of studs and one pair of hoops. Size 0.8-5.2 cm.
Fitted vest top in soft cotton jersey with a racer back.

Warm-lined boots in imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Soft velour linings and insoles and chunky soles. Height of soles 3.5 cm.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with buttons down the back, a seam at the waist with a detachable bow at the back and a skirt in a double layer of tulle. Lined.
Short skirt in patterned viscose jersey with wide smocking at the waist for best fit over the tummy. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam with a flounce at the hem.
Short coat in felted fabric containing some recycled wool with notch lapels, concealed buttons at the front, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Recycled polyester lining.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud and front pockets.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a soft brushed inside. Front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the hoodie is organic.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned linen and viscose weave with wide, adjustable shoulder straps that can be fastened in different ways at the back. Gathered seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.
Fitted strappy top in soft organic cotton jersey.
Knee-length dress in an airy weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with ties at the waist and short butterfly sleeves. Lined bodice.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a scalloped trim around the neckline and armholes.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Shell jacket in windproof, breathable functional fabric with taped seams, waterproof zips and a hood with a reinforced peak and elasticated drawstring. Zip down the front, zipped side pockets and zips at both sides that open for ventilation. Snow flaps with reinforced elastication and adjustable press-stud fastenings at the waist, and an adjustable hook and loop tab at the cuffs. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Sleeveless dresses in organic cotton jersey with a seam at the waist and flared skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey.
Loafers in imitation suede made partly from recycled polyester. Linings and insoles in a cotton weave and patterned soles.
Calf-length skirt in a viscose weave with a high waist, pleats at the front for added width and a concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Jackets in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a V-neck, low dropped shoulders with reverse-stitched seams, long sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
LOVE STORIES x H&M. Wide tunic in an airy cotton weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar with ties at the front. Long, wide sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and tiers to the hem.
Leggings in stretch jersey with a denim look. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend with an interactive motif.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with 3/4-length sleeves and ribbed cuffs. High slits with a decorative button at the sides for easier nursing access.
Knee-length dress in jersey crêpe and lace with a round neckline and cap sleeves. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip at the back, and a gently flared skirt.

Calf-length dress in a crêpe weave with a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud and tie at the top. Long sleeves with slits and a drawstring at the cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with printed side stripes in a relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Short-sleeved, round-necked T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Three-strand metal necklace with chains in various designs, two decorated with a pendant.
EMMA JAYNE x H&M. Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif. Raw edges around the neckline and sleeves.
Jumpsuit in soft viscose with buttons at the top, short sleeves with a tab and button, chest pockets and side pockets. Elastication at the waist and hems.
Long-sleeved dress in chiffon crêpe with a V-neck, buttons at the front and a gently tapered waist with a gathered seam. Unlined.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood and detachable tie belt at the waist.
Trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, zip fly and button and detachable tie belt. Patch front pockets and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cardigan in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, side pockets and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Jacket in a soft weave with a concealed double-breasted press-stud fastening at the front. Hood with a detachable faux fur trim, pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Lined in a recycled polyester weave.
Sleeveless top in airy, pleated chiffon with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

Trousers in a heavily draping viscose weave with a high, pleated waist, pockets in the side seams and flap back pockets. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening and wide, straight legs with sewn-in creases.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and elasticated crossover straps at the waist and sides.
Sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a racer back and cut-out section at the back.

Single-breasted tuxedo jacket in woven fabric with satin details. Covered button at the front, a chest pocket, jetted front pockets and an inner pocket. Decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This, combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves, creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Vest top in soft, patterned organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Bolero in a soft, fluffy fine knit with a faceted button at the front and long sleeves.
